title: How to copy my all of my old SD card data to a new SD card - Quora

response.answer_text: The traditional way to transfer data from an old SD card to an SD card is Copy and Paste. But the job of migrate data to SD card is complicated especially the data you need to migrate is very large. A little carelessness can lead to the loss of important data. At this time, the method of Copy and Paste is not so reliable. But using a professional data migration software to copy data to SD card can be very efficient. I have used a data migration tool named AOMEI Partition Assistant to copy my old SD card to the new SD card before. It’s very easy to migrate data to SD card. Maybe you can have a try~
